name: json-schema-ref-parser

scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:node && npm run coverage:browser
scripts.coverage:browser: npm run build -- --coverage && npm run test:browser -- --coverage
scripts.release: npm run upgrade && npm test && npm run bump
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser && npm run test:typescript && npm run lint
